title: Tender for the Supply of Dried Factor VIII Fraction BP, 18000 Vials
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health to award the above tender to the lowest responsive bidder, on the recommendation of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee for a total cost of US $1,196,640.00 (LKR 131,750,640.00), was approved by the Cabinet.
